message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $20,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value, but $10,000 is significantly below what I can accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $16,000? This price reflects the true value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $16,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000, which is the maximum I can afford. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my financial constraints.
